Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored in the 40th minute against Ecuador.
Lionel Messi returned to international football in the second half.
Argentina won 1-0 against Ecuador in a Copa America warm-up match.
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Scaloni decided to sit Lionel Messi for the first half to take care of him.
Argentina hasn’t lost in their last seven meetings with Ecuador, dating back to 2019.
Post-Match Reflections: Scaloni stated that the goal is to continue competing and these players have competing in their blood.
Argentina will face Guatemala in their next warm-up match before starting the Copa America against Canada.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angel Di Maria's second consecutive goal in an international match.
Lionel Messi is now tied with Gonzalo Higuain for the fifth-most goals in Argentina’s history with 31 goals.
Ecuador has upcoming friendly matches against Bolivia and Honduras before starting the Copa America against Venezuela.
